about.description:
SHTns is a high performance library for Spherical
Harmonic Transform written in C, aimed at numerical
simulation (fluid flows, mhd, ...) in spherical
geometries.
about.summary: Fast spherical harmonic transform library aimed at high performance numerical simulations in spherical geometries.

name: shtns
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "shtns" %}
{% set version = "3.3.1" %}
{% set revision = "r694" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://www.bitbucket.org/nschaeff/{{ name }}/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}-{{ revision }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 3fcca0ffcf28467fd80ef71e0032c15ac6deac5c592041dc6a9a7f4575fbe64c
    folder: src

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:

  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - fftw
    - numpy
    - python
  run:
    - fftw
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - shtns

about:
  home: https://nschaeff.bitbucket.io/shtns/
  license: CeCILL2.1
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Fast spherical harmonic transform library aimed at high performance numerical simulations in spherical geometries.'

  description: |
    SHTns is a high performance library for Spherical
    Harmonic Transform written in C, aimed at numerical
    simulation (fluid flows, mhd, ...) in spherical
    geometries.

  doc_url: https://nschaeff.bitbucket.io/shtns/
  dev_url: https://github.com/simplejson/simplejson

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - peterspackman
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.6.15
